text:
Austin: iOS Developer | Full Time

LeanMeanTech is looking to add two iOS developers to the team - one senior developer who can build iPhone and iPad apps without a lot of guidance, and one junior/mid-level developer to work with one of our senior developers.

We also do a lot of Android and server-side development, so you'd have the ability to work on other projects if you wanted.

A little about us: we work on mobile app projects for clients - this is a great role if you want to work with customers (both technical and non-technical) or if you want to move out of freelance iOS development into a full time position.
